name: BetterOptimization
description: This mod tries to optimize the level.

noglow.name: No Glow
noglow.description: Disables object glow for better performance.

nomirror.name: No Mirror
nomirror.description: Disables object mirror for better gameplay.

novehicleparticles.name: No Vehicle Particles
novehicleparticles.description: Disables vehicle particles for better performance.

noparticles.name: No Particles
noparticles.description: Disables all particles for better performance.

enable-fps-bypass.name: Enable FPS Bypass
enable-fps-bypass.description: Allows modifying the FPS (frames per second).

fps-bypass.name: FPS Value
fps-bypass.description: Set the FPS (frames per second) value. Don't put 100k.
